Wrapper allowing a stack of RNN cells to behave as a single cell.

Source: R/autogen-layers-rnn.R
layer_stacked_rnn_cells.Rd

Used to implement efficient stacked RNNs.

layer_stacked_rnn_cells(cells, ...)

Arguments

cells

List of RNN cell instances.

...

Passed on to the Python callable

Examples

batch_size = 3
sentence_length = 5
num_features = 2
new_shape = (batch_size, sentence_length, num_features)
x = np.reshape(np.arange(30), new_shape)

rnn_cells = [keras.layers.LSTMCell(128) for _ in range(2)]
stacked_lstm = keras.layers.StackedRNNCells(rnn_cells)
lstm_layer = keras.layers.RNN(stacked_lstm)

result = lstm_layer(x)

See also

  • https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/StackedRNNCells

Other recurrent layers: layer_bidirectional(), layer_conv_lstm_1d(), layer_conv_lstm_2d(), layer_conv_lstm_3d(), layer_gru_cell(), layer_gru(), layer_lstm_cell(), layer_lstm(), layer_rnn(), layer_simple_rnn_cell(), layer_simple_rnn(), layer_time_distributed()
